text: We may transfer Personal Data that we maintain about you to recipients in countries other than the country in which the Personal Data was originally collected, including to the United States.

How Personal Data is used api.video uses personal information that we collect about you or that you provide to us, in order to: 1. to send you Newsletters, White Papers, Ebooks; 2. to provide you with access to our services; 3. to maintain access controls over secured areas of our websites and platform; 4. to communicate with you and respond to your questions relating to usage of our platform; 5. to process your payment; 6. to enhance your experience using our websites and services; 7. for analytics and research purposes, including to monitor and track usage of the Service; 8. for marketing and advertising purposes, such as to offer you our new products or services we think that you may be interested in.

These service providers may need to access Personal Data to perform their services.
You are entitled to: request that we transfer your personal data to you or another service provider in a simple, structured format;

We collect and store your personal data: when you visit our website; when you download ebooks or whitepapers; when you complete forms on our website to subscribe to a service or newsletter; when you request assistance from our Support team via the website, the chat or our platform; when you upload or watch a video via our platform or our player.
We may share Personal Data to comply with applicable law, and to respond to requests from courts and other public and government authorities, which may include authorities outside your country of residence.
We only share your Personal Data with a limited number of trusted service providers to assist us in providing the Services to you such as website hosting, infrastructure provider, content delivery networks, customer service, email delivery, banking operation, credit card networks .
We retain your Personal Data as long as we are providing the Services to you and after we cease providing Services to you, even if you close your account, in order to comply with our legal, tax and accounting obligations and/or in order to resolve disputes.
